hadiths.text: Shurahbil bin Muslim Al-Khawlani said:I heard Abu Umamah Al-Bahili say: I heard the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) say: " No woman should spend anything from her house without her husband's permission." They said: "O Messenger of Allah, not even food?" He said: "That is among the best of our wealth

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا لِلْمَرْأَةِ مِنْ مَالِ زَوْجِهَا
chapter.eng-name: What A Woman Is Entitled To Of Her Husband’s Wealth
